caption.p: ( a) Cyclic voltammograms of a 5 mM solution of QUI 6 in unbuffered solution of 1 M KCl at different pHs. ( b) The resulting potential-pH diagram shows the reduction (red), average (green), and oxidation (black) peak potentials. The voltammograms were recorded at a scan rate of 100 mV/s using a 3 mm diameter glassy carbon disk electrode.
